Job Title:
English Language Experts - Writers (Freelance, Remote, 20+ openings)
English Language Experts - Writers (Freelance, Remote, 20+ openings)
Job description:
About the job
Job Description

English Language Experts

Are you excited about writing, research, and language — and eager to apply your skills to the future of AI?

This is a fully remote, fully flexible role where you decide your schedule. Not only will you be able to implement your writing and language skills in impactful projects, but you’ll also have the opportunity to build passive income forever through our referral program, earning as long as your referred candidates continue working.

📌 To ensure the success of your application, we strongly recommend watching our video guide on the application process before applying.

The Role: Where Your Language Expertise Meets AI Innovation

As an AI Data Trainer, you will:

Develop AI Training Content: Create detailed prompts in various topics and responses to guide AI learning, ensuring the models reflect a comprehensive understanding of diverse subjects.
Optimize AI Performance: Evaluate and rank AI responses to enhance the model's accuracy, fluency, and contextual relevance.
Ensure Model Integrity: Test AI models for potential inaccuracies or biases, validating their reliability across use cases.

Bring your expertise - we’ll take care of the rest with a tailored onboarding experience that sets you up for success from day one.

Your Profile

Apply if this sounds like you (even if not every point applies):

You are a student or graduate with a Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Linguistics, Communication, or a related field.
You have a strong command of written English, with good grammar, syntax, and stylistic versatility.
You enjoy doing research, exploring new topics, and turning ideas into clear, structured content.
You like creative writing, experimenting with different tones and formats.
You bring an analytical mindset and pay attention to detail, delivering quality work independently.
You might even have experience with AI/LLM training — if so, that’s a great plus, but it’s not required.

Commitment

This is a fully flexible, remote role - you choose when and where you work. To set yourself up for success on the project, it makes sense to dedicate at least 20 hours per week or more, while still keeping a healthy balance that fits your lifestyle.

Job Title:
Virtual Assistant (Work From Home)
Virtual Assistant (Work From Home)
Job description:
About the job
Persona is the company top startups use to hire people from all around the world. Our vision is a future where each person can find the best role for them and companies can discover the world’s best talent. Founded by two Stanford University graduates, Persona works with the world’s fastest-growing technology startups. Our clients are funded by some of the world’s top investors, like Founders Fund, Sequoia Capital, and Andreessen Horowitz.

Persona is a talent agency that recruits, trains, and staffs talented remote professionals such as yourself. This is an opportunity to work closely with the future Googles, Facebooks, and Amazons of the world—building out their organizations and helping them reach the next level of success.

We support everyone we hire with training, mentoring, and technology resources so they are enabled to do their best and are as happy as possible in their roles. We have a large international team dedicated to supporting and taking care of new Persona team members, and our goal is to provide excellent long-term career opportunities for everyone who joins the team.

Who’s building Persona?
We are a global team of passionate problem solvers who love to build new things and make our customers happy. Our team is made up of motivated, hard-working people spanning the globe, united by a culture of learning and continuous improvement.

What we’re looking for:
We are looking for Virtual Assistants to help our clients operate and scale different parts of their growing businesses. As a Virtual Assistant you'll be a general problem solver, collaborating with different teams at our client company and helping them with various projects.

Responsibilities—what you'll do:
Drafting emails and handling business communications
Taking video conferences
Interfacing with clients and customers
Scheduling and planning meetings and events
Online research and data collection using spreadsheets
Reporting and analysis
Creative work with writing and media
Other administrative tasks and projects

Requirements:
Fully fluent in English
Skilled in the use of apps and technology
Ability to commit long-term and full-time
Ability to work U.S. business hours (Pacific Time, Central Time, or Eastern Time)
No work experience is required, but we will take any work experience you have into account
This position is for serious, career-oriented candidates

Other qualities we look for:
Track record of success at work or in school
An ability to solve complex problems with minimal guidance
Experience in high performance work or school environments
Skilled at anticipating team members’ needs
Willingness to work hard and persevere
Intellectual curiosity and resourcefulness
Professionalism

What we offer:
Best salaries in the industry
Permanent ability to work from anywhere in the world
Opportunities for growth and advancement
A fast-paced and collaborative environment
Warm and friendly company culture
Full benefits

Benefits at Persona:
Health insurance
Unlimited paid time off (paid sick and vacation leaves)
Annual bonuses based on performance
Monthly tech allowance
Opportunity to be paid in your currency of choice
Others depending on seniority

This is a full-time and long-term role, dedicated exclusively to serving one of our clients. We are looking for individuals who are ready to fully commit their time and energy to one company and grow and develop along with that company. All roles at Persona are 100% work-from-anywhere (work from home or wherever it suits you best). If this is your first time working for a U.S. company, that’s okay; we provide guidance and assistance getting set up as a remote professional. Once hired, we will carefully match you to a client company of ours that perfectly suits your career background, skills, and goals.

In case you or any exceptional people you know are exploring other roles, our rapidly growing company is also looking for new team members with backgrounds in administration, bookkeeping, accounting, finance, project management, operations, recruiting, human resources, content writing, social media management, research, executive assistance, customer service, customer support, technical support, data management, video editing, sales, account management, marketing, and design.

Visit our website for more information: https://www.personatalent.com/

Freelance Singer – Remote with verification
Job description:
About the job
This role is ideal for a skilled vocalist with a passion for Spanish-language music and a deep appreciation for Latin musical traditions. The selected singer will deliver authentic performances across a range of genres, including flamenco, pop, ranchera, bolero, salsa, and contemporary Latin music. The position is remote, offering flexibility to perform for various audiences at events, private functions, and special occasions without the need for on-site presence. The ideal candidate will bring energy, professionalism, and a strong stage presence to every performance, ensuring memorable experiences for diverse audiences.

Responsibilities

 Perform Spanish-language songs across multiple genres, adapting style to suit event requirements
 Prepare and rehearse setlists tailored to specific audiences and occasions
 Deliver engaging live or recorded performances for venues, restaurants, private events, and special functions
 Collaborate with event organizers to understand performance expectations and logistics
 Maintain high vocal standards and stage presence throughout each performance
 Incorporate audience interaction and engagement techniques as appropriate
 Manage remote performance logistics, including audio setup and delivery of high-quality recordings or live streams

Skills And Requirements

 Proven experience as a singer specializing in Spanish and Latin American music genres
 Strong vocal technique and ability to perform a diverse repertoire
 Excellent command of Spanish pronunciation and lyrical interpretation
 Confident stage presence and ability to engage audiences in live or virtual settings
 Familiarity with remote performance technology and audio equipment
 Ability to work independently and meet deadlines for scheduled performances
 Professionalism, reliability, and strong communication skills
 Availability for flexible scheduling, including evenings and weekends as needed

About Twine

Twine is a leading freelance marketplace connecting top freelancers, consultants, and contractors with companies needing creative and tech expertise. Trusted by Fortune 500 companies and innovative startups alike, Twine enables companies to scale their teams globally.

Our Mission

Twine's mission is to empower creators and businesses to thrive in an AI-driven, freelance-first world.

Job Title:
Associate eIDAS Auditor (Freelance)
Associate eIDAS Auditor (Freelance) with verification
Job description:
About the job
Great that you're thinking about a career with BSI!

Job Title: eIDAS Auditor (Freelance)

Location: UK, Italy, Spain, France, or Germany

Job Type: Freelance/Contractor

Salary: Negotiable rates dependant on experience

Are you looking for the opportunity to advance your career within eIDAS regulations by becoming an auditor?

BSI is a conformity assessment body for the UK and EU eIDAS Regulation and provides certification that is recognized across the European Union by trust service providers and regulatory authorities. This BSI conformity assessment ensures that digital trust services meet the required standards of security, reliability, and compliance. It is designed to support Qualified Trust Service Providers (QTSPs) in delivering trusted services such as electronic signatures, seals, timestamps, and website authentication, fostering confidence in the digital ecosystem.

As a BSI eIDAS auditor you will join our team of experienced professionals.

You'll have solid working knowledge and experience in Trust Services Providers, including a good understanding of eIDAS, Trust Services and the relevant ETSI standards. Previous experience with auditing management system standards such as ISO 27001 is desirable but not essential.

You’ll be home-based, but you'll be out and about visiting our clients daily (so you need to be comfortable with daily travel and will need to hold a full driving licence). You’ll usually spend nine out of ten days auditing. You'll need to be comfortable with interacting and speaking to different people in all capacities.

To ensure you have a good work/life balance, we like to minimise the travel requirements on our Auditors wherever possible, which may also include some remote auditing. That means for this role, we’re looking for someone located in either the United Kingdom, Italy, Spain, France or Germany.

Key Responsibilities

As an eIDAS Auditor, your role will include:

Conducting compliance audits for Qualified Trust Service Providers (QTSPs) under the eIDAS Regulation.
Evaluating systems, policies, and processes for adherence to standards such as ETSI EN 319 401, 319 411-1/-2, EN 319 421 and other relevant specifications.
Producing and reviewing detailed audit reports with actionable recommendations.
Staying updated on legislative changes and technical standards within the trust services domain.
Collaborating with cross-functional teams to address complex compliance challenges.


Required Skills & Experience

Proven experience in digital trust services or information security.
In-depth knowledge of eIDAS Regulation and related ETSI standards.
Certifications such as CISA, ISO/IEC 27001 Lead Auditor, or equivalent (preferred).
Strong understanding of cryptographic principles and Public Key Infrastructure (PKI).
Excellent analytical skills and attention to detail.
Effective communication and report-writing skills.
Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects.


D&I Policy 

BSI is committed to ensuring the diversity of our workforce reflects that of our clients and the communities in which we operate. Our goal is to create a sense of belonging for all employees by providing opportunities to develop, grow, and engage with our global organization all while having fun doing great work. BSI is a community where everyone can thrive.

If you require any reasonable accommodations to be made on account of a disability or impairment throughout out our recruiting process, please inform your Talent Acquisition Partner.

Our Excellence Behaviours: Client-centric, Agile, Collaborative. These three behaviours represent how we do things at BSI. They help us ensure that BSI is a great place to work and a highly successful business.

BSI is conducting face-to-face interviews where appropriate and possible. If you are invited to a face-to-face interview but feel more comfortable with conducting the interview virtually, please speak to a member of our recruitment team.

Recruiter presentation: Senior Talent Acquisition Partner - EMEA - ProPharma
Job description:
About the job
Company Description

For the past 20 years, ProPharma has improved the health and wellness of patients by providing advice and expertise that empowers biotech, med device, and pharmaceutical organizations of all sizes to confidently advance scientific breakthroughs and introduce new therapies. As the world’s largest RCO (Research Consulting Organization), ProPharma partners with its clients through an advise-build-operate model across the complete product lifecycle. With deep domain expertise in regulatory sciences, clinical research solutions, quality & compliance, pharmacovigilance, medical information, and R&D technology, ProPharma offers an end-to-end suite of fully customizable consulting solutions that de-risk and accelerate our partners’ most high-profile drug and device programs.

Job Description

We are currently looking to partner with Pharmacovigilance (GVP) Auditor who can partner with us to perform a critical GVP audit for one of our key clients in Quarter 1 2026 (dates are flexible within the period). This audit specifically focuses on Patient Support Programmes and it requires 1 full day auditing on a remote basis (additional hours put aside for preparation & write up). The audit also requires fluency in Spanish and English; you must be currently based in the UK/EU and ideally working as an independent Consultant or within a small consultancy.

Qualifications required

Must have an education of at least BSc or higher within a life-sciences or medical discipline
Extensive experience in Pharmacovigilance (GVP) auditing is required with the life-sciences sector
Demonstrated experience working on patient support programmes (from an auditor perspective) is highly preferred
Thorough experience working as a GVP Auditor is a must
Fluent in English and Spanish (verbal & written)
Can perform the audit within Q1 of 2026
Excellent stakeholder management skills

Additional information

We celebrate our differences and strive to create a workplace where each person can be their authentic self. We are committed to diversity, equity, and inclusion. Employees are encouraged to unleash their innovative, collaborative, and entrepreneurial spirits. With a holistic approach as an Equal Opportunity Employer, we provide a safe space where all employees feel empowered to succeed.

***ProPharma Group does not accept unsolicited resumes from recruiters/third parties. Please, no phone calls or emails to anyone regarding this posting.***

10 sentences at a normal speed

6 sentences at a fast speed

4 sentences at a slow speed

▷ Record in a quiet environment using your phone or computer microphone.

What You’ll Get

▷ $ 0.10 per sentence (60 sentences = about $6 total)

▷ Work from home, anytime that suits you

Job Title:
Customer Success Manager
Customer Success Manager with verification
Job description:
About the job
💡 Customer Success Manager – EMEA
We’re looking for a Customer Success Manager (Enterprise) to join Freepik, our rapidly scaling AI-powered creative platform. This is a unique opportunity to shape the foundation of our customer success strategy and play a key role in how enterprise clients grow and create with Freepik.
As CSM, you’ll build strong, lasting relationships with our enterprise customers — driving adoption, retention, and measurable business impact. You’ll work hand-in-hand with Sales, Product, and Leadership teams to ensure every customer not only reaches their goals but becomes an advocate for Freepik.
If you’re passionate about creativity, technology, and customer success — and you love building from scratch — this is your chance to make your mark.

🚀 What You’ll Do
Own customer outcomes: Drive adoption, maximize ROI, and manage the full renewal process — addressing risks early and ensuring strong retention.
Be the voice of the customer: Translate customer insights into action, influencing product decisions and go-to-market strategies.
Build scalable systems: Create success frameworks, playbooks, and automated processes to support a growing enterprise portfolio.
Act on data: Use key metrics and health indicators to identify opportunities, mitigate churn, and accelerate expansion.
Collaborate cross-functionally: Partner with Sales, Product, and Engineering to identify growth levers and enhance customer experience.

🎯 How Success Will Be Measured
Net Revenue Retention: Consistently exceed 100% through upsells, renewals, and expansion.
Customer Adoption & Engagement: Maintain high utilization rates through proactive support and training.
Customer Satisfaction & Advocacy: Achieve top-tier NPS and strong customer referrals.
Operational Efficiency: Build scalable, repeatable success processes that maintain a personal touch.

💪 What You’ll Bring
Proven experience in Customer Success or Account Management with enterprise clients (ideally in SaaS, AI, or creative tech).
A track record of driving retention, growth, and measurable customer impact.
Experience building CS operations from zero and thriving in fast-changing environments.
Analytical mindset with hands-on experience in tools like Salesforce, Zendesk, Intercom, or Gainsight.
Technical curiosity and comfort with AI or complex digital products.
A collaborative, proactive, and adaptable approach — you see challenges as opportunities to innovate.

🌟 Why Join Freepik
At Freepik, we’re on a mission to make creativity more accessible and intelligent through the power of AI. You’ll join a bold, fast-moving team where your ideas drive real impact, your voice matters, and your growth is encouraged.
Here, you won’t just manage customers — you’ll help shape how global companies create, innovate, and succeed with Freepik.

📍 Location: Europe (Remote)
💰 Salary: OTE €60K–€100K (depending on location)
Ready to redefine enterprise customer success and build something extraordinary from day one?
Apply now and help shape the future of Freepik.

Job Title:
Commodity Trader - Cocoa
Commodity Trader - Cocoa
Recruiter presentation: Head of Research & Resourcing | Executive Search & Guaranteed Hiring in Commodities, Shipping and Financial Markets
Job description:
About the job
Title: Cocoa Trader
Location: Remote/WFH | Europe or APAC
Salary: Negotiable (newly created position)

Imperium Commodity Search is confidentially retained by an edible oils/agricultural trading business headquartered in Nigeria, as they look to expand their product offering into the Cocoa space. With strong sourcing relationships in West Africa, our client is seeking an experienced cocoa trader who can work to expand quantities and build a global trading portfolio across cocoa, adding to the firms existing ingredients/agri trading business.

Duties & Responsibilities:
Establish physical cocoa trading desk, building and maintaining relationships with producers/processors and wholesalers/manufacturers for the sale of cocoa products
Work with senior management on fostering and expanding relationships with farms/producers in West Africa
Managing hedging/futures positions for risk management purposes
Actively promote the business/brand to counterparties in the cocoa trading/production and processing space to expand the geographical footprint of the cocoa business
Keep up to date with analysis and market news to facilitate timely and profitable trades, working with the wider team on strategy
Work with operations/finance teams internally to ensure timely and accurate logistics/supply chain for the cocoa trading business

Experience:
Minimum of 5 years experience in cocoa trading, with a good network of clients in the European, Asian or Middle Eastern markets.
Excellent knowledge of the cocoa markets, with a thorough understanding of market pressures/analysis to inform trading strategy and decisions.
Good understanding/experience in futures/hedging/risk management using derivative instruments
Fluent in spoken/written English, with a good understanding of documentation around physical cocoa trading
Ability to work remotely/travel where required for client meetings/business development

If you meet the above criteria, please send your CV/Resume to Zuzana Zvolenská at zuzana.zvolenska@imperiumcs.com or click the apply button

All conversations are handled in the strictest confidence. You can also reach out to any of our team via LinkedIn, or by telephone to +44 (0) 203 927 5090

Job Title:
Learning Systems Designer
Learning Systems Designer
Job description:
About the job
Learning Systems Designer (Full-Time) 🚀

Easypeasy is an edtech startup rebuilding how people learn English. We work fast, iterate constantly, and treat learning design as a craft.
This isn’t a slow or highly structured environment — you’ll have room to build, experiment, and shape core parts of the product. And this isn’t a 9 to 5 either, join us if you’re down to put in the hours and own your projects.

We’re redesigning the entire learning experience: lessons, practice, AI feedback, and everything students do outside the classroom.
We’re looking for someone who understands how people learn and enjoys turning that insight into real systems and tools.

What You’ll Own:

🤖AI-Driven Learning Tools 
Set up flows where AI reads and interprets lesson transcripts
Detect learner mistakes and generate relevant practice
Prototype, test, and ship early versions independently
Shape the student-facing UX around these features

📚Out-of-Class Practice Systems 
uild and maintain curated libraries of videos, podcasts, and materials sorted by level/topic
Create simple, effective practice tasks connected to classroom learning
Help design the broader self-study journey

✅Lesson Quality & Pedagogical Coherence 
Evaluate lesson drafts and exercises and suggest improvements
Use your teaching experience to keep everything intuitive and learner-friendly
Align the in-class and out-of-class experience with us

💡Rapid Prototyping 
Take rough ideas and turn them into working tools quickly
Iterate based on feedback and your own testing
Work with a team that ships regularly

What You Need to Bring: 

💼Background 
You’re fluent in English (C1/C2)
You’ve taught a language before
You’ve learned a language as an adult
You understand learning from the inside — not just the theory
You enjoy improving the way people learn

🧠Mindset 
You’re comfortable working at a fast pace
You’re practical, curious, and willing to learn new tools
You can switch between quick iteration and deeper design work
You like co-creating and discussing ideas, not just executing tasks
You care about clarity, usefulness, and student experience

🛠️Skills 
Strong pedagogical intuition
Ability to prototype and test ideas on your own
Basic comfort with AI tools and willingness to explore new ones
Clear communication and structured thinking
Ability to design learning flows that make sense end-to-end

You don’t need to code. You don’t need to be a data expert. You do need to enjoy figuring things out.

🎁What We Offer:
Fully remote role
Competitive salary + performance bonus
Ownership from day one
The chance to shape how thousands of students learn
A small, focused team with space to build quickly

⚠️ This role suits someone hungry and ambitious who likes responsibility, pace, and creative problem-solving. If you prefer routine, slow cycles, or strict boundaries, it may not be the right fit. ⚠️

• Tu sais écrire pour une audience féminine, jeune, ambitieuse et connectée

• Tu maîtrises les frameworks type AIDA, PAS, storytelling, copy émotionnelle

• Tu comprends les enjeux de conversion, watch time et scroll-stop

• Tu écris comme une humaine, pas comme ChatGPT (je te vois )

Avantages
Environnement :

• Univers : influence, formation, social selling, marque personnelle

• Ton : féminin, direct, complice, qui tutoie et qui parle vrai

• Objectifs : watch time, conversions, engagement et notoriété

Ce que je t’offre :

• Une collab sur le long terme si le feeling est là

• Des projets variés, fun et très visibles

• Une totale liberté géographique (100 % remote)

• Un rythme flexible mais avec de l’exigence sur la qualité

Pour que ta candidature soit étudiée, merci de répondre à cette annonce avec TOUS les éléments ci-dessous :



Date de disponibilité réelle pour débuter le poste (obligatoire)



Prétention salariale / TJM (obligatoire)



Ton CV en PDF (obligatoire)



Un portfolio ou des exemples de textes (scripts, pages de vente, emails, etc.) en PDF (obligatoire)



Une courte vidéo de présentation (30 secondes max) est un vrai plus



Si une seule info est manquante, la candidature ne sera pas retenue. Merci pour ta compréhension

Si ta candidature est retenue, tu seras conviée à une deuxième phase composée d’un ou plusieurs tests concrets (script, pub, page de vente).

Job Title:
Turkish Speaker for AI Training (Yapay Zekâ Eğitimi için Türkçe Konuşmacı) [Remote]
Turkish Speaker for AI Training (Yapay Zekâ Eğitimi için Türkçe Konuşmacı) [Remote]
Job description:
About the job
Babel Audio ile, yeni nesil konuşma yapabilen yapay zeka modellerini eğiterek para kazanabilirsiniz.

Japonca ve 18 diğer dilde sesli kayıtlı tartışmalara katılmak üzere yapay zeka konuşma partnerleri arıyoruz. Bu konuşmalar popüler kültür, yemek, filmler, hayat hikayeleri ve daha birçok konuyu kapsayacaktır.

Bu, eğlenceli sohbetler yaparken para kazanabileceğiniz tamamen uzaktan çalışabileceğiniz bir fırsattır.

Görev hakkında:
Kendi çalışma saatlerinizi ve programınızı seçin - bazı katılımcılar haftada 1 saat, diğerleri ise 40 saatten fazla çalışır.
Sessiz ve dikkatinizi dağıtmayacak bir ortamınız olduğu sürece, neredeyse her yerden uzaktan çalışabilirsiniz.
Kaydedilen saat başına 25.00 ABD doları+ ödeme yapılır.

Sizin hakkınızda:
Türkçe ve İngilizce'yi akıcı bir şekilde konuşabilmelisiniz.
18 yaşından büyük olmalısınız.
Güvenilir bir cihaz ve internet bağlantınız olmalıdır. Hemen hemen her cihazı (telefon, dizüstü bilgisayar, tablet vb.) kullanabilirsiniz, ancak WiFi/ethernet bağlantınız olmalıdır (hücresel bağlantı izin verilmez).
Yüksek ses kalitesi için harici mikrofonlar tercih edilir, ancak zorunlu değildir (USB masaüstü mikrofonları veya kulaklıklar önerilir).

Nasıl başvurabilirsiniz:
1. Sağlanan URL'den başvuru formunu doldurun - bu, tüm projeler için geçerli başvuru formudur.
2. Başvuru sırasında kendinizle ilgili bilgiler ve kısa bir ses örneği istenecektir.
